name: SmartPlaylist
description: A rebuilt and modernized plugin to create smart, rule-based playlists in Jellyfin.

versions.changelog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.9.104-rc -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where the status page wouldn't load properly in some cases
* Fixed an issue where you could not leave Suffix Text blank.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.9.103-rc...v10.11.9.104-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.9.103-rc -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added weekday operator support for date fields
* Added support for bulk refreshing lists
### Other Changes
* Minor UI improvements


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.9.102-rc...v10.11.9.103-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.9.102-rc -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where Collections would not get properly deleted
* Fixed issues when sorting by series name and episode name
### Other Changes
* Implemented a new queue system along with a new cache system for increased performance when multiple lists are refreshed
* Sorting by name and series name now sorts by SortTitle metadata first


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.9.101-rc...v10.11.9.102-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.9.101-rc -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Notification message changes
### Other Changes
* Fixed formatting for JellyfinPlaylistId


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.9.100-rc...v10.11.9.101-rc

## Major update with support for Collections!

- Name changed from SmartPlaylist to **SmartLists**
- The entire codebase has been **refactored**
- Support for **Collections** has been added.
- A **status page** has been added
- And **many** other backend changes

### Breaking changes

- Migration logic from older versions has been removed, you must be running **Jellyfin 10.11.2.0** and have **refreshed all playlists** prior to updating â€” skipping this may result in broken playlists.
- The legacy Jellyfin tasks have been removed. Make sure no playlists are using these, and if so, set a custom schedule for them instead.

If you find any bugs, please report them here: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/issues

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.1.101-rc -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* Improved performance by using parallel processing for more fields.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.1.100-rc...v10.11.1.101-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.1.100-rc -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added support for multiple sorting options. Added Episode and Season as sorting options.
* Add sorting options for Last Played, Runtime, Series Name, Album Name and Artist.
* The rule fields Studios and Genres can now search parent series for episodes.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed a bug where the UI would incorrectly always show "Sunday" for weekly schedules.
### Other Changes
* Only show sort options related to the media type(s) selected.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.1.0...v10.11.1.100-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.0.102-rc -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added conditional rule field visibility logic, only displaying the rule fields related to the chosen media type.
* Added support for all Jellyfin people fields.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.0.101-rc...v10.11.0.102-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.0.101-rc -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue with the playlist refresh logic


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.0.100-rc...v10.11.0.101-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.0.100-rc -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now add multiple schedules.
* Added rule field support for: Actors, Directors, Producers, Writers, Guest Stars
* You can now choose which metadata properties to include when selecting the 'Similar To' rule field.
* Added support for the following audio metadata: Bitrate, Sample Rate, Bit Depth, Codec, Channels.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where equals/not equals operators were missing for some rule fields.
### Other Changes
* Simplified and optimized the AutoRefresh setting logic


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.0.1...v10.11.0.100-rc

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc8 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Sorting by name now takes into account if the name begins with numbers and sorts them properly.
* Added playlist statistics


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc7...v10.10.10.0-rc8

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc7 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added option to ignore leading article 'The' when sorting by name
* You can now choose to include tags from parent Series for episodes.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc6...v10.10.10.0-rc7

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc6 -->



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc5...v10.10.10.0-rc6

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc5 -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* Implement time buffer checks for playlist refresh scheduling


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc4...v10.10.10.0-rc5

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc4 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added hours option to the Newer Than/Older than operators and allow zero as value.
### Other Changes
* Removed 'Series' media type due to Jellyfin limitations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc3...v10.10.10.0-rc4

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc3 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Some minor UI fixes and tweaks
### Other Changes
* Various minor fixes and tweaks.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc2...v10.10.10.0-rc3

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc2 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Major improvements to the 'Manage Playlists' page (filter, bulk select, clone playlists, etc).
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where the scheduled time for refresh would show wrong in the UI


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc1...v10.10.10.0-rc2

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added option to update playlists automatically based on library updates.
* You can now set individual playlist refresh schedules
* You can now sort by play count


### Other Changes
* Separated 'Refresh All Playlists' logic from Jellyfin tasks.
* Minor sorting UI changes
* Styling adjustments


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.9.1...v10.10.10.0-rc1

name: MusicTags
description: Automatically extract metadata from audio files - such as ID3 tags, Vorbis comments, and more - and convert them into standard Jellyfin tags.
